title: [Admission] Help regarding pes app (joined today)
content: Guys today I got admitted to pes thru kcet , my doudt is they made me fill an application for all parents , address details , that time that lady there asked me for email to log in to that application which is also same email for my pes app( student login )and ....when I told my email , she said you cannot use email which is given for jee admission ( basically for registration thru jee which I had done before) ....so since I didn't have any other email of mine , I just gave my mom's....now in pes app , for my student details it's showing my mom's email and number , it's showing you can edit , so can I edit and put my email or shud i create one other email for myself and put that one ( asking coz that lady at pes told you cant use email given during pessat / jee mains )

comments.body: You can edit it to your email address.
Bro what documents did you take for admission????
It's over bro now your mom would be getting admission not youðŸ˜° /s
i have the same problem and it doesn't allow me to update it to my details
